title: Getting Stronger: Weight Training for Men and Women : Sports Training, General Conditioning, Bodybuilding
description: Getting Is Actually Three Books in one Strength Training for 21 different sports. Off-season, Pre-season & Training Programs. General Conditioning. Staying in shape with three 45 minute workouts a week. Bodybuilding. Beginning, intermediate, advanced, competitive. Posing plus more. This book is not being published.
author: Bill Pearl
